# distance

**Instance Property**

The distance, in meters, from the camera to the detected surface.

## Declaration

```swift
var distance: CGFloat { get }
```

## Examining Result Geometry

- **worldTransform**: The position and orientation of the result relative to the world coordinate system.
- **localTransform**: The position and orientation of the result relative to the nearest anchor or feature point.
